TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SocketCachePolicy extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the policy for removing clients from the cache maintained by remoting clients.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This enumeration is used when setting the `socketCachePolicy` configuration property of a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel> object. It determines whether the time specified by the `socketCacheTimeout` configuration property is measured from the time a socket was last used or from the time a socket was created.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SocketCachePolicy AbsoluteTimeout = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Remove a socket from the cache a fixed time after its creation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.SocketCachePolicy Default = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Remove a socket from the cache a fixed time after its last use.
